subject: Robin here
body:
How does 3k a day sound to you? Sound impossible? Well I have news for you. Call now to hear how it is done.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-687-3704




Get back to me via Sterling9Sterling@computech.com if not lnterested





Women and cats will do as they please and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea. --Robert A. Heinlein
